item.title: Projects
item.description: where to stream A simple web app to check if a tv show or movie can be found on Prime Video, Netflix, etc Github go vue vuetify gcp

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Software developer working from Ghana, with interest in backend development and DevOps. I also have interests in Software Architecture and, Machine learning, particularly Natural language Processing(NLP). I work with NodeJS, Go, Flutter and Javascript. I use Google Cloud Platform for personal projects. I use AWS at my current workplace. My interest in DevOps and Software Architecture grows as I work on projects and because there is a need for it.
